hero.title: 3D Developer
hero.subtitle: Bringing Ideas to Life
hero.description: Crafting immersive 3D experiences through cutting-edge technology and creative innovation

about.description:
I'm a passionate 3D Developer with a deep love for creating immersive digital experiences. My journey in 3D graphics began several years ago, and since then, I've been dedicated to pushing the boundaries of what's possible in real-time 3D rendering.

My expertise spans across multiple disciplines including 3D modeling, texturing, animation, and real-time rendering. I specialize in creating optimized, high-quality assets for games, virtual reality, and interactive applications.

When I'm not crafting 3D worlds, you can find me exploring new rendering techniques, learning cutting-edge technologies, and contributing to the 3D development community.

education.specialization: Specialized in Computer Graphics, 3D Programming & Rendering, Graduated with Honors

experience.title: Senior 3D Developer
experience.works:
Lead 3D asset pipeline development for AAA game projects
Optimize real-time rendering performance for VR applications
Mentor junior developers and conduct code reviews
Implement procedural generation systems using Houdini

works.title: Cyberpunk City
works.description: A stunning futuristic cityscape with neon lights and detailed architecture. Created for a AAA game project with optimized performance.

works.title: Sci-Fi Character
works.description: High-detail game-ready character model with PBR materials and optimized topology for real-time rendering.

works.title: Fantasy Environment
works.description: Magical forest environment with detailed foliage and atmospheric lighting for an indie RPG game.
